column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Common bond is a great place to have breakfast or lunch with a small group of friends. I went once for breakfast and had the Yogurt Parfait
column2: and once for lunch where I had their 2 ways egg salad sandwich. Both were delicious and very filling: I ate the egg salad sandwich for 2 more meals! The atmosphere is lovely and classy; most people eating there were slightly dressed up. The bakery had a large selection of delicious pastries and macaroons. I tried a croissant and a vanilla macaroon; both were wonderful. My only complaint is that it's hard to get service if you sit outdoors
column3: and it was constantly being bombarded by hungry pigeons. But my indoor seating experience was perfect.
